name: cookingTemperature_setValue
description: This function is used to set the temperature of a specific compartment in a cooking appliance.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the temperature.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment within the device to set the temperature.

parameters.name: cookingTemperature
parameters.description: The temperature value to set for the cooking device.
